column4: Hi all,I have installed ubuntu successfully and now i want to install windows in another partition.So do i folllow the normal procedures or do i have to config anything else
I have installed ubuntu successfully and now i want to install windows in another partition.So do i folllow the normal procedures or do i have to config anything else
windows will overwrite the MBR/GRUB menu so you wull have tor estore that.. and add an entry for windows In the grub menu/config file.
theres an example grub entry int he menu.lst that boots windows on the first partition/hd.
